label: reporting_date
description: Date to associate to indicators and observations

label: confirmed_cases
description: Number of confirmed cases for the respective pathogen and reporting period

label: suspected_cases
description: Number of suspected cases for the respective pathogen and reporting period

label: total_cases
description: Number of total cases including confirmed and suspected for the respective pathogen and reporting period

label: pathogen
description: Pathogen related to the reported figures
